channel.title: How to make teleport commands
channel.description:
This is how to add tele port commands.
1. go into client.java
2. do ctrl+f to do a find
3. then search "command.start"
4. then make a new space for the code to go in.
5. no add the code
} if(command.startsWith("home") && playerRights >= 0){ triggerTele(3094, 3470, 0); brightness = 4; }
6. where it has ("home") you can change the home to staff if you want your command to be ::staff to go to staff zone.
7. playerRights >= 0){ change the 0 to a 1 to make it so only mods, admins and owner's can go to the command. or keep it as 0 for every one to be able to tele there.
8. triggerTele(3094, 3470, 0); this is the bit that tele's you some were. to get the place where you want the command to tele you to. You have to go to the spot then do ::mypos ingame. To get the possion it will come up with the cords. like 3055, 2763 if you want to tele to that possion you would have to change this "triggerTele(3094, 3470, 0);" to this "triggerTele(3055, 2763, 0);".
hope it help's.
(no flameing at me.)
moderator's do not close keep open for the noob's
this is helpfull to all noobs

item.title: How to make teleport commands
item.dc:creator: @noobyest_noob noobyest noob
item.description:
@noobyest_noob wrote:

This is how to add tele port commands.

  1. go into client.java

  2. do ctrl+f to do a find

  3. then search “command.start”

  4. then make a new space for the code to go in.

  5. no add the code

                               }

if(command.startsWith(“home”) && playerRights >= 0){
triggerTele(3094, 3470, 0);
brightness = 4;
}

  1. where it has (“home”) you can change the home to staff if you want your command to be ::staff to go to staff zone.

  2. playerRights >= 0){ change the 0 to a 1 to make it so only mods, admins and owner’s can go to the command. or keep it as 0 for every one to be able to tele there.

  3. triggerTele(3094, 3470, 0); this is the bit that tele’s you some were. to get the place where you want the command to tele you to. You have to go to the spot then do ::mypos ingame. To get the possion it will come up with the cords. like 3055, 2763 if you want to tele to that possion you would have to change this “triggerTele(3094, 3470, 0);” to this “triggerTele(3055, 2763, 0);”.

hope it help’s.

(no flameing at me.)

moderator’s do not close keep open for the noob’s

this is helpfull to all noobs

Read full topic
